field.label: Enabled
field.help: This will enable or disable the group.

field.label: Auth port
field.help: Maps IP Ports to this filter group.

field.label: Auth IP
field.help: Maps client IPs to this filter group.

field.label: Naughtyness limit
field.help: This the limit over which the page will be blocked. Each weighted phrase is given a value either positive or negative and the values added up. Phrases to do with good subjects will have negative values, and bad subjects will have positive values. See the weightedphraselist file for examples. As a guide: 60 is for young children, 100 for old children, 160 for young adults.

field.label: SSL man in the middle
field.help: Forge ssl certificates for all non-exception sites, decrypt the data then re encrypt it using a different private key. Used to filter ssl sites

field.label: Enable MITM site certificate checking
field.help: Ignored if SSL man in the middle is off.

field.label: Enable SSL support
field.help: Auto switch to MITM with upstream connection error or to deliver block page ignored if sslmitm is off. To revert to v4 type behavour switch this off. Default is 'on'

field.label: Enable Deep URL Analysis
field.help: When enabled, E2 looks for URLs within URLs, checking against the bannedsitelist and bannedurllist. This can be used, for example, to block images originating from banned sites from appearing in Google Images search results, as the original URLs are embedded in the thumbnail GET requests.
